Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-9681 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-9681 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.40-3, affected by CVE-2024-9681
